function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive plans for meeting carbon emission reductions","Impact":"Continued increase in carbon emissions leading to climate change","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive plans for meeting carbon emission reductions and implementing them effectively","Technologies":"Carbon monitoring and reduction technologies, renewable energy systems","People":"General public, future generations","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, building owners"},{"Description":"Slow progress in achieving carbon neutral buildings by 2030","Impact":"Failure to mitigate climate change effectively and meet sustainability targets","Mitigation":"Implementing stricter regulations and standards, investing in renewable energy and carbon offsetting","Technologies":"Energy-efficient building technologies, renewable energy systems, carbon offset programs","People":"General public, environmental advocates, policy makers","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, building owners"},{"Description":"Unequal distribution of GHG emissions across different types of buildings","Impact":"Inequitable distribution of climate change impact, with smaller buildings bearing a disproportionate burden","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted emissions reduction strategies for smaller buildings, promoting energy efficiency and green building practices","Technologies":"Energy-efficient building technologies, green building certifications, carbon monitoring and reduction technologies","People":"Owners of smaller buildings, communities in urban areas","Owner":"Building owners, city planning authorities, environmental organizations"}]}
